tool_description: Retrieves real-time and historical market data for specified financial instruments with configurable data frequency and time ranges.

symbols.description: List of ticker symbols to fetch data for

lookback_hours.description: Hours of historical data to include (1-720)

error_messages: Invalid symbols: One or more ticker symbols are not recognized or supported.
Invalid data frequency: Use one of [1m, 5m, 15m, 1h, 1d].
Lookback period out of range: Must be between 1 and 720 hours.
Data source unavailable: Market data service is currently unavailable.
usage: Provide array of symbols and optionally set data_frequency and lookback_hours. Returns timestamped price data for each symbol.

symbols.description: List of symbols for which data was retrieved

prices.description: Array of price values corresponding to timestamps

volumes.description: Array of volume values corresponding to timestamps
